home.aiSupportDesc: Get immediate, empathetic support 24/7. Our AI chatbot is trained to help you through difficult situations.
home.reportingDesc: Report incidents safely and anonymously. Your identity is protected while we help you get the support you need.
home.journalDesc: Express your feelings in a safe, private space. Track your mood and reflect on your experiences.
home.dashboardDesc: For educators and counselors: Monitor trends, track incidents, and provide better support to students.
home.awarenessDesc: Learn about cybersecurity, recognize scams, and understand your rights online through interactive content.

report.title: Anonymous Reporting
report.privacyDesc: This form is completely anonymous. We do not collect any identifying information. Your report will be reviewed by trained counselors who can provide appropriate support and intervention.
report.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe what happened. Include as much detail as you're comfortable sharing, such as when it occurred, who was involved (if known), and how it affected you.
report.descriptionNote: The more details you provide, the better we can help. But only share what you're comfortable with.
report.uploadPrompt: Click to upload screenshots or documents
report.info2: Urgent situations may require immediate action
report.info3: You can submit multiple reports if needed
report.info4: Consider also talking to a trusted adult or counselor
report.needHelpDesc: If you're in immediate danger or experiencing a crisis, please reach out to these resources:
report.successDesc: Thank you for your courage in reporting this incident. Your report has been received and will be reviewed by our team within 24 hours. Remember, you're not alone, and help is available.
